name: Monster
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: MetaLand is an RPG in monsters' perspective based on the D20 rules. It balances casual and strategy, with a complete social system and an extremely strong meta-universe immersion.
